body.name: BEBE Women's Luggage Marie 29" Hardside Check in Spinner, Telescoping Handles, Black Floral Print, One Size
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 22 hrs 43 mins
features: Interior features mesh organization pocket and tie down straps
body.description: Travel with decadence, sophistication & class using the marie 29" hardside check-in luggage from bebe. Take beauty and elegance with you to all of your destinations. This exquisitely designed luggage set will leave a lasting impression for years to come. Made with lightweight polycarbonate, it is durable yet versatile. Our beautifully crafted 8 wheel, 360 degree spinner system and aluminium trolley handle are both functional and chic, which will allow you to travel fashionably with ease.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Marie 29" Check-in Spinner Luggage The Marie luggage is made of Polycarbonate material, which is extremely lightweight, durable, and protects the contents of your luggage. It's black floral print design will surely leave a lasting impression for years to come.

Features Multi-directional spinner wheels High quality multi-directional spinner wheels are easy to maneuver and make traveling in style a breeze, thanks to its eight 360-degree spinner wheels. Lined Interior Fully imprinted interior lining, along with an interior zippered mesh pocket. Main compartment includes tie down straps to secure contents and prevent shifting while traveling. Extra Lifting Handle Includes our exclusive patented extra carrying handle at the base of the luggage. This unique feature provides an extra functional purpose for lifting heavy luggage off the floor or even from baggage claim, to prevent unnecessary back injuries.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love its ease of handling!
reviews.reviewText: I've used the suitcase only once and though it got some scruffs and mark ups (which doesn't bother me), I love how easy it handles! It turns on a dime because of the spinner wheels and its lightweight feel, and I was able to push it around easily in the busy Denver and Atlanta airports, even with 2 hand bags. I had recently bought another "top name" brand suitcase set that I loved until I got this one, so I'm going to get rid of that set b/c I am now a convert to this brand / style and even ordered a 21" size! The color is very pretty, too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This luggage is so beautiful. The colors are more vabriant in person.
reviews.reviewText: I traveled on a weekend trip and this luggage held up well. The material is that of a soft material. But durable. Can't wait to go on another trip and use these. Beautiful.. They are a must have.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars As good as most, only prettier
reviews.reviewText: This is lightweight, beautiful and help up better than expected through the trials and tribulations of the baggage transport system. There were a couple small scrapes and scuffs, but that's the downside of all hardside luggage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 2, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Wheel broke off!
reviews.reviewText: This luggage was my first real set (also bought the matching smaller carry on size). Super cute and the color was beautiful. I originally bought this luggage for a trip to Maui and it held up pretty well. Scratches and scuffs were to be expected. Second time using it for a trip to New Zealand...not a great experience. Got to New Zealand, picked up my luggage from claims and it only had three wheels. Having to haul that thing around on three wheels, along with my other pieces of luggage... was a pain and not fun! I think we all can agree we buy luggage with wheels to make the transit much easier when traveling and the one biggest feature this luggage had was the wheels, "four of them" and it was an epic fail. The process from the airport to the hotel was a struggle, as well as, from the hotel back to the airport on the way home. Trying to keep that big luggage balanced rolling it and while carrying and rolling my other luggage was challenging. I was super bummed because this was a beautiful set. Now I'm in the market for another set but I will NOT buy this one again!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2019
reviews.reviewText: My husband got this for me as a gift. It didn't arrive on time but from what he said he was compensated. He was upset that he had to tell me I wasn't going to have it until later. When I did use it, it was absolutely durable and gorgeous. Wheels worked perfect. Rolled well in boarding lines, over speed bumps, in the que lines. It held a ton of clothes and was extremely heavy. I was surprised by how well it rolled. I am very happy with this gift.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 14, 2018
reviews.reviewText: Haven’t used yet, but I’ll give an update later once I’ve flown with it. So far, super impressed. I was worried that the actual product wouldn’t match the photo or I wouldn’t like something about the pattern when I received it, but it’s even prettier than in the picture online! Lightweight, spins easily. Seems high quality and I love the separate compartments inside. Have gotten compliments on it just letting it sit in my living room for a week Haha - too cute to put away just yet ;-) Super happy with this purchase so far.UPDATE: I have traveled with this luggage twice and it held up beautifully!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars BEAUTIFUL BUT NEED A STRONGER ZIPPER
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE the look of this luggage and it is roomy and LIGHT and easy to carry, even though it is large. But the zipper worries me. It seems to be poor quality and it was hard to zip and looked ready to burst on my flight home. I have only used it once so the zipper may hold out. Can I buy a warranty now?Other than the fact that the zipper seems too weak for such a large suitcase and is somewhat difficult to zip and there is a concern that it may not hold up long-term, I am extremely pleased with this beautiful luggage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s really pretty and durable
reviews.reviewText: I love how easy it is to navigate through the airport.
